divs: Sighting DetailsI have been trying to decide if I should report this or not.The time was between 1-1:30 am.I was sitting in the den and decided to open the back door to get the cool air in the room.There was an unusual bright light in the western sky that caught my attention.The entire neighbor-hood dogs were barking.There is always folks walking in the neighborhood but not at this hour and not every dog barking at the same time.My dogs were barking also.I was leaning out the door when a bright "strobe-like" light came down over the house...happened in an instant.I leaned out to see what it was when I saw a tall,very thin dark shadow duct when it saw me and go back behind my van.I called my husband(he was in the living room watching TV) and told him what happened.We checked the yard and cars...nothing!!This gave me a strange feeling as it did not look human.It was dark and we had a street light on.This figure was tall,very thin and bent forward.It was almost shadow-like and very fast movement.It was dark and the van was about 20 feet away,under a carport.The bright object had disappeared and no more strobe like light.Has this happened to anyone else?
Summary: bright white that would turn off and on then put out a strobe light beam when shadow was seen ducting behind family van
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around October 3rd 2011
